addr: 860 South Los Angeles Street. 11th Floor. Los Angeles, CA 90014
title: A CURRENT AFFAIR: Pop Up Vintage Marketplace in DTLA | HOLIDAY 2015
desc: Discount Tickets Available For A Limited Time! The #BESTVINTAGEUNDERONEROOF returns this winter for our Holiday edition!? Bringing together over 50 premier vintage retailers and private dealers from both coasts and beyond, A Current Affair is back with the best vintage clothing, accessories, and jewelry like never before.?The show will feature an exhibit curated by a special guest host, lite bites, lounge, open bar, music and more! Exhibitors include Scout, Just Say Native, Recess, Mercy Vintage Now!, Arrow and Anchor, and MORE!? ? ? FOLLOW US @ACURRENTAFFAIR FOR UPDATES! Show hours are Saturday and Sunday December 12+13 12-6pm, with a preview admission ticket granting access at 10am Saturday only. The Weekend Pass offers the opportunity to shop both days as well as access to the preview hours. Tickets are available in advance at a discounted rate or at the door. Tickets purchased at the door are $15 (General Admission), $25 (Preview), $35 (Weekend Pass). Your General Admission ticket is good for either day. Now in its fifth year, A Current Affair is a major source for stylists, designers, and anyone in search of one of a kind vintage ranging from perfectly worn-in jeans to rare and collectible designer vintage. Shop an array of vintage clothing, accessories, and jewelry from the Victorian Era through today.
